channel.title: Gravity - QPhysics - VPhysics - oh my
channel.description:
I've had an idea for a game in my head for years... A large part of this game requires localized gravity for each player and or vehicle.
[url='https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/Gravity']From what i can tell[/url] Vphysics is for the entire scene while Qphysics is reserved for players/NPC. Also stated in the wiki is that [url='https://developer.valvesoftware.com/wiki/QPhysics#QPhysics']"Vehicles and flying NPCs do use VPhysics..."[/url]
So does this mean that all Vehicles and flying NPCs must use the same gravity? Or am I reading that wrong.

item.title: Gravity - QPhysics - VPhysics - oh my
item.dc:creator: Trigger_Proximity
item.description:
I have no idea. From what I know of Source and the SDK Vphysics controls everything and yes they do share gravity but the weight of the props/npcs changes it. You may be able to use a brush entity I’ve forgotten the name of (trigger_gravity/func_gravity) I’ve never played around with them BUT you might be able to edit the flags to change what it affects so the player/props have lower gravity whereas it would use a different entity for other things.
